33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah narrated that the Prophet(s.a.w) said:"Indeed, after me you will see preferential treatment, and matters that you dislike." They said: "Then what do you command us[O Messenger of Allah!]" He said: "Give them their rights, and ask Allah for yours

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الأَثَرَةِ وَمَا جَاءَ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been Related About Preferential Treatment
